element.name: export
element.label: Exporter - Export
element.description: Enable exporter.

element.name: export_server
element.label: Exporter - Export - Server
element.description: Optional: http://di1.bx-cloud.com by default if left empty.

element.name: export_publish_config
element.label: Exporter - Export - Publish Configuration
element.description: Yes by default. Any changes in product/customers/transaction properties will be automatically validated. For safety, it is recommended to de-activate this option once in production to make sure no unwanted changes are automatically published. However, if not activated, changes in the configuration will not be considered until published otherwise and, in the case of property deletions, the data sync might fail until the changes are published. Publishing of the configuration can be done by re-activating this option and running a full data sync again, or by publishing the configuration directly in ShpwBxl Data Intelligence web-admin.

element.name: export_product_include
element.label: Exporter - Products - Include Properties
element.description: Optional: list of product properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter).

element.name: export_product_exclude
element.label: Exporter - Products - Exclude Properties
element.description: Optional: list of product properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of product properties to include is not empty.

element.name: export_product_images
element.label: Exporter - Products - Image URL
element.description: Optional: Export image and thumbnail image URLs (not required if standard usage of search and recommendations, as the shop renders the images itself). If activated, makes export slower.

element.name: export_product_url
element.label: Exporter - Products - Product URL
element.description: Optional: Export product urls (not required if standard usage of search and recommendations, as the shop renders the url itself). If activated, makes export slower.

element.name: export_customer_enable
element.label: Exporter - Customers
element.description: Enable customer export.

element.name: export_customer_include
element.label: Exporter - Customers - Include Properties
element.description: Optional: list of customer properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter).

element.name: export_customer_include
element.label: Exporter - Customers - Exclude Properties
element.description: Optional: list of customer properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of customer properties to include is not empty.

element.name: export_transaction_enable
element.label: Exporter - Transactions
element.description: Enable transaction export.

element.name: export_transaction_mode
element.label: Exporter - Transactions - Mode
element.description: Choose how the transaction should be exported. For Incremental, the exporter will only export the last month.

element.name: export_transaction_include
element.label: Exporter - Transactions - Include Properties
element.description: Optional: list of transactions properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported except the ones defined as excluded properties (next parameter).

element.name: export_transaction_exclude
element.label: Exporter - Transactions - Exclude Properties
element.description: Optional: list of transactions properties separated by ','; if left empty, then all properties will be exported, this field is ignored if the list of transactions/orders properties to include is not empty.

element.name: export_voucher_enable
element.label: Exporter - Voucher
element.description: Enable voucher export.

element.name: export_cron_schedule
element.label: Exporter - Schedule
element.description: Set the time in minutes for the delta export cron job to wait since the last full export cron job. This option needs to be set, if you use the delta export cron job regularly, otherwise the delta export will run while the full export is still processing. Usually 4 hours (240 minutes) should be good, but this depends on the size of your shop.
